item.description:
A Saturday evening vacation trip......sort of....

We'll start our night with the 6:00pm showing of "To The Arctic" at the Omni Theater at the Museum of Science.  This showing will also include a revival showing of "New England Time Capsule".  This is the original trailer used when the Omni Theater opened 25 years ago and includes narration by Leonard Nimoy and cars rushing into the Storrow Drive tunnel.

http://www.mos.org/exhibits_shows/imax&d=5386

Tickets for the show are $10.00.  Follow the link below for ticket purchase.  Please note that these shows tend to sell out early.

https://store.mos.org/?action=showevent;event_id=655

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

After the show we can walk over to The Helmand for warm and wonderful Afghani cusine.

The Helmand is located at 143 First Street in Cambridge.

http://www.helmandrestaurant.com/
item.how_to_find_us: We'll gather in the lobby near the membership desk no later than 5:45

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Let's venture north "To The Arctic", then trek south to The Helmand
